Development Team

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Developer & Architect”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Quorum Holdings

Since its inception in 2014, Quorum Holdings has been at the forefront of transforming real estate with a proven track record of creating out-of-the-ordinary office, retail, residential, and industrial spaces across South Africa. With innovative vision, Quorum Holdings is dedicated to enhancing environments and delivering commercially viable, socially impactful, and economically profitable properties.
https://www.qholdings.co.za/[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Transferring Attorney”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

C&A Friedlander Attorneys

C&A Friedlander Attorneys traces its roots to the establishment of the firm Friedlander & Du Toit in Cape Town in 1899. After more than 100 years of successful practice and service to the community, C&A Friedlander Attorneys, with its mixture of strong traditionalism blended with youthful innovation, comprises a dynamic practice offering a wide range of specialist legal services, and is committed to remaining at the forefront of legal developments.
https://caf.co.za/[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Bond Originators”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Bond Originators

We have teamed up with the leading bond originators of South Africa. Please feel free to reach out to either to get the best deal on your bond.
BetterBond | Ooba[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Short-Term Rental Operator”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Propr

Propr is the only host management company based in Africa and the Middle East to have direct API integration with Airbnb. Founded in 2015, Propr has served over 300,000+ happy customers in 5 cities across over 800 properties.
https://www.propr.co.za/[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Development Facts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Address”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]33 Regent Road, Sea Point, Cape Town
View on Google Maps[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Sales Launch Date”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Sales launch online at 1pm on Wednesday, 8 October 2025 via the interactive price list: sales.dear-jean.co.za[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Estimated Completion Date”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Estimated completion is set for Q4 2027[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Fixtures, Finishes & Upgrades”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
  • Apartments will come with standard finishes, as well as the option to upgrade.
  • Air conditioning and double glazing included with each unit.
  • Two colour themes will be available to choose from.
  • Furniture packs will be available at an extra cost.
  • Upgrade packs will be available at an extra cost.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Amenities”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
  • The ground and first floor will be reserved for retail and a restaurant which will be able to be enjoyed by all tenants. 
  • Basement parking.
  • Laundry room available within the building.
  • Certain units include private swimming pools: 
    • Unit 321
    • Unit 322
    • Unit 325
    • Unit 327
    • Unit 524 (also includes a jacuzzi)
    • Unit 526 (also includes a jacuzzi)
    • Unit 801
    • Unit 802
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Electricity and Water Meter”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Standard metered[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Security Features”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
  • State-of-the-art security & biometric access control
  • 24-Hour on-site security & concierge service
  • CCTV to all common areas
  • Back-up power in common areas
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Parking”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]There are 44 residential parking bays: 

  • 11 bays are pre-allocated to specific units and are included in the unit price.
  • 24 units then have the first option to purchase a parking bay.
  • The remaining 9 bays, along with any unpurchased bays from the above 24, will be sold on a first-come, first-served basis.

Parking bays are priced at R375,000 (including VAT) per bay.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Optional Extras”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Additional AC units are available for one and two-bedroom apartments.
Option to upgrade finishes to an upgraded spec.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Storerooms”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Storerooms are available on request.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Air Conditioning”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Each unit is sold with AC included. Additional AC units are available for one and two-bedroom apartments.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Furniture Packs”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes, furniture packs are available for purchase from Bone Studio or Newman Architecture and Design.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Backup Power”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Backup power is available for common areas.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Green Building Features”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]The building has been designed to comply with SANS10400XA regulations;

  • Only Low Flow Plumbing fixtures have been used
  • A centralised Hot Water Heat Pump System is in use 
  • The full building is double glazed as to increase thermal properties
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”High-speed Wi-Fi”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]High-speed fibre connectivity ensures residents have super-fast internet in their apartments. This will be for the owner/residents account and the appointed ISP (Internet Service Provider) will need to be contacted to open/activate individual accounts.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Lift Access”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]There will be 2 elevators available in the building.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Pet Policy”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Pets are allowed as per the BC rules.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Rental Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Can I make use of external rental agencies for short-term rentals?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes, Propr has been appointed by Quorum to prepare a short-term rental proposal for the building and it is recommended that buyers make use of their services. 

Buyers are however able to rent their units as preferred, with no restrictions in place apart from the Body Corporate and Management Rules.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Can I furnish the apartment myself and still use the rental services provided by the appointed operator?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Can I short-term let if I am an owner-occupier?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Can I rent out my apartment long term?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”When will we be able to find a tenant?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]After the completion of the development, the transfer process will commence. Occupation will be given as soon as an occupation certificate is granted. You will be able to occupy or rent out your apartment from the date of occupation.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Interactive Sales Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”How it works”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
  • Sales launch online at 1pm on Wednesday, 8 October 2025 via the interactive price list: https://sales.dear-jean.co.za/.
  • Ahead of the sales launch you will be able to view and browse all the available units by visiting the user-friendly interactive price list.
  • There you can use the filters and sort function to narrow down your search.
  • On each unit the layout, all costs and expected rentals are shown.
  • Once sales go live you can reserve your preferred unit/s online with a reservation fee.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Create Your Shortlist”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Your shortlist acts as a wish list of units that you have quick access to ahead of and on the launch day. Simply click the ADD TO LIST button on your favourite units. You can also reserve your preferred unit directly from the Shortlist when sales go live.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Unlocking your R200,000 launch discount”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]To unlock your discount, simply click the green discount button below the price on any unit and follow the prompts to complete your Buyer Profile. Once completed, the discounted price will show on the price list on all units.
Ts&Cs apply.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”The Reservation Process”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]All reservations will happen online via the interactive price list.
The below list outlines the steps you’ll need to be familiar with in order to have the best chance of securing the unit you want to purchase.

  1. Register and log in to sales.dear-jean.co.za a few minutes before 1pm.
  2. Once the countdown reaches zero and sales go live at 1pm, the RESERVE buttons with become active (you don’t have to refresh your browser). 
  3. Click the RESERVE button on your selected unit to start the process. Make sure to be quick as others may also be interested in the same unit.
  4. Complete the form and accept the terms: Click RESERVE
  5. Your reservation will now move to the pending state where you will have 10 minutes to finalise payment of the reservation fee.
  6. You will then pay your non-refundable R10,000 reservation fee via the following methods:
    • Visa or Mastercard
    • Apple Pay
    • Masterpass
    • Snapscan
  7. Once the R10,000 fee is concluded, your unit will be reserved!*
  8. You will then receive an email from our team confirming your reservation. *Ts&Cs apply.

Next steps:

  • The Agreement of Sale will be sent to you via email, this will need to be signed and returned to us within 3 business days.
  • The full deposit required is 10% of the purchase price within 7 days from the signature date. The deposit is paid into the transferring attorney’s interest-bearing account and your money will earn interest for you.
  • The balance (90%) will need to be secured within 21 days from the signature date by either a bond approval, bank guarantee, or cash.
  • Alternatively, we will also accept a 30% non-refundable deposit (paid within 7 days from signature date) with the balance payable 60 days prior to the transfer.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Benefits of Purchasing on Launch”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]
  • R200,000 launch discount.
  • Best selection of units.
  • Capital appreciation for 24 months is estimated at 16% (8% pa) while the development is under construction.
  • Rare opportunity to own in Sea Point, Cape Town, a prime location and with proximity to key amenities and tourist attractions. 
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” overflow=”visible” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

General Purchase Questions

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Finance Options”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Financed deals

  • Minimum 10% deposit with the balance in the form of a bond approval
    • Deposit to be paid within 7 days from receiving deposit instruction from the transferring attorneys.
    • The deposit is paid into the transferring attorney’s interest-bearing account and your money will earn interest for you.
    • The balance (90%) will need to be secured within 21 days with bond approval.

Cash deals

  • 30% non-refundable deposit
    • Deposit to be paid within 7 days from receiving instruction from the transferring attorneys.
    • The deposit is paid into the transferring attorney’s interest-bearing account and your money will earn interest for you.
    • The balance to be paid 60 days prior to lodgement/handover once written instruction has been received from the transferring attorneys.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”What happens if my bond is not approved, do I get my deposit back?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Yes, the deal is subject to your bond being approved and should it not be approved the deposit is paid back to you with interest. If you are unsure if you can afford the bond it is a good idea to get pre-qualified prior to the launch as the R10,000 reservation fee is not refundable.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Once my bond is approved, when do I start paying?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Bond repayments will only commence after the development has been completed and once the transfer of the apartment you have purchased, has taken place.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Bond Registration Costs”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Bond costs are payable at the time that the bond registers, once the development is complete.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Transfer Duties”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]The Seller is registered for VAT so there will be no transfer duty but transfer costs (attorney fees) will be payable.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”What are the transfer fees?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]On a purchase price of R2,85 million, the transfer costs will be R53,051*.
To calculate the transfer costs you can click on the below link: https://www.betterbond.co.za/calculators/bond-and-transfer/
NB: Please select yes when it asks if the seller is registered for VAT.
*Please note these are subject to change[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”What do the levies include?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Levies are determined in terms of the sectional title and exclusive use area of the apartments. Levies are calculated at a standard rate to be determined.
They cover the costs of security, cleaning and upkeep of the common areas, maintenance of the building, building insurance and all running – and management costs. [/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Rates”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Monthly rates are based on the value of the property and are calculated based on the value of the property and then multiplied by 0.007159 to get your yearly rates. Divide this by 12 to get your monthly rates.

Rates include COCT rates & CID levy.

Moreover, residential properties enjoy a rebate of R450,000 of the property’s municipal value, provided the total value is R5 million or less. For properties exceeding R5 million, a nominal R15,000 rebate applies.

Example: R2,85 million property

  • R2,850,000 – R450,000 = R2,400,000 taxable value
  • R2,400,000 x 0.007159 = R17,181.60 per annum
  • This equates to R1,431.80 per month
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Are there any hidden costs?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]No hidden costs. VAT inclusive, no transfer duty. Rates, taxes and CID will apply.

The contract price is the price the client will pay for the property. You must be aware that there is occupational interest due from the date you take occupation until you take ownership (transfer takes place).

The other costs applicable are detailed above and include monthly rates and levies. Bond costs will be payable prior to registration of your bond once you take transfer of your unit. Transfer costs at this point will also be applicable but these costs are largely offset by the interest that you earn on your deposit during the construction period.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”When will we be able to move in/find a tenant?”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]After the completion of the development, the transfer process will commence. Occupation will be given as soon as an occupation certificate is granted. You will be able to occupy or rent out your apartment from the date of occupation.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Buying off-plan property in Cape Town”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

  1. Cape Town sees an average annual capital growth of 8%, so your property value is growing at roughly 8% pa but you are only required to put down 10% of the development value.
  2. This means you are getting growth on the full purchase price of the property and only have to put down a fraction of the price.
  3. Your tenant is largely paying off your investment property & bond for you.
  4. Your rental income increases every year but bond repayments generally stay the same and in relation to yearly salary and incomes inflating, the bond repayments become relatively cheaper every year.
  5. There is high demand for secure luxury property in Cape Town’s City Centre and Atlantic Seaboard, resulting in a secure long-term investment.
  6. The longer it takes to enter the property market the harder it becomes.
  7. Property investment is likely to create long-term sustainable wealth and an ever-increasing annuity income.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” top_margin=”30px” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]

Tax Incentives

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”closed”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ heading_tag=”default” heading_tag_functionality=”default” title=”Section 13Sex Tax Incentive”][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Investors have access to powerful tax incentives, including the popular Section 13sex of the Income Tax Act No 58 of 1962. This scheme enables any taxpayer who owns five or more new, residential rental units (do not all have to be from the same development), to claim up to 55% of the purchase price as a tax deduction.

Example:

  • Purchase five units at a total purchase price of R19,868,075
  • Minus the launch discount = R1,000,000 (R200,000 per unit, if purchased on launch)
  • Final purchase price = R18,868,075
  • Deemed purchase price = R10,377,441 (55% of final purchase price)
  • 5% of the deemed price may be used as a tax deduction per year

This works out to a tax deduction (tax write-off) of R518,872 per year for 20 years.
Total tax write-off = R10,377,441 (over 20 years).

Taxpayer criteria for Section 13Sex

  • The taxpayer must own at least 5 residential units. The deal kicks in once the buyer takes ownership of their 5th new unit. A residential unit refers to a building or self-contained apartment, mainly used for residential accommodation with the exclusion of structures used for business purposes, for example, hotels.
  • All units must be situated in South Africa.
  • Residential units must have been purchased new and unused. (For example, buyers of flats that had previously been occupied would not qualify for this incentive.)
  • The units must be used solely for the purpose of trade (i.e. residential letting). This prevents housing claims for personal use.
  • Please consult your tax advisor for further clarification and information.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row]
